title: TOCS 2021
desc:
TOCS is the "Trophée des objets connectés" (Trophy of connected objects).
I finished the TOCS by winning the Jury Prize with the presentation of my CyberDeck (in plexiglass).
See more at :

  • Twitter post
  • LinkedIn post

title: Apprenticeship at AquilaCMS
desc:
AquilaCMS Development (e-commerce CMS):

  • An open-source e-commerce web application
  • A 100% JavaScript solution with MERN Stack
  • A mutli-themes website : Front-end can be used with any JS technology (ReactJS, VueJS, Angular, etc)
  • A complete back office to manage everything in your website

Worked with :

  • AngularJS
  • NodeJs
  • ReactJS
  • MongoDB
  • Cypress (bash script with automatic front-end tests)
  • Mocha (API test)
  • Creation of documentation for plugin integration in Aquila
  • Creation of some Aquila plugins

desc:

title: Tutored Project with Thales Alenia Space
desc:
The project (made in group of 6) was to update a moving robot and adapt a spacial Camera (ToF - Time Of Flight) to it.
A video which present the project is available here : https://youtu.be/Xz0L6iHNSwA
